arts.ttl: How to Watch Barcelona vs. Athletic Club on TV, Live Stream
arts.sum: In the United States, Barcelona fans can tune-in to the match through ESPN Select and the ESPN App . After more than two seasons, Barcelona return to their spiritual home of Camp Nou when they host Athletic Club on Saturday.
